overview: After a one night stand, trans mechanic Andrew is pregnant. Without friends, family, or abortion access in his home state of Ohio, Andrew must enlist the help of his hookup, a drag queen named Lex, to accompany him to his appointment at Planned Parenthood in Detroit. As they trek through the Midwest, Andrew finds love and self-acceptance in unexpected places, and learns the importance of chosen family.
title: T-Minus
